context_bundle.summary: Consul Connect provides service-to-service connection authorization and encryption using mutual TLS with a service mesh architecture

onboarding.quick_start: consul agent -dev -client=0.0.0.0 -ui && consul services register -name web -port 8080 && consul intention create -source web -destination db
common_patterns: Health checks: 'consul services register -name web -check http://192.168.1.100:8080/health -interval 10s'
Service discovery: 'consul catalog services' and 'dig web.service.consul @127.0.0.1 -p 8600'
Service mesh: 'consul connect inject -enable web' and 'consul intention create -source web -destination db'
K/V store: 'consul kv put config/database "host=postgres port=5432"' and 'consul kv get config/database'
Security: 'consul acl policy create -name web-policy -rules @web-policy.hcl' and token management
known_errors: Service not healthy: 'consul health checks' and verify HTTP endpoint accessibility and timeouts
DNS resolution failed: 'systemctl-resolve --status' and configure resolvers in /etc/resolv.conf with 'nameserver 127.0.0.1'
TLS handshake error: 'consul tls cert create -server' and verify certificate chain and CA configuration
Leadership election failed: 'consul operator raft list-peers' and check network connectivity between agents
ACL permission denied: 'consul acl token read <token-id>' and verify token policies and service identities
